Başlangıçlar.name: Classic Bruschetta
Başlangıçlar.description: Grilled bread topped with fresh diced tomatoes, garlic, basil, and a drizzle of balsamic glaze.

Başlangıçlar.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
Başlangıçlar.description: Savory mushroom caps filled with a delicious mixture of herbs, breadcrumbs, and Parmesan cheese.

Başlangıçlar.name: Fried Calamari
Başlangıçlar.description: Tender calamari rings lightly battered and fried to a golden crisp, served with marinara sauce.

Ana_Yemekler.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
Ana_Yemekler.description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

Ana_Yemekler.name: Tiramisu
Ana_Yemekler.description: Classic Italian dessert made with espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

Ana_Yemekler.name: Cheesecake
Ana_Yemekler.description: Rich and creamy cheesecake served with your choice of strawberry or blueberry topping.

İçecekler.name: Fresh Lemonade
İçecekler.description: Refreshing homemade lemonade with a hint of mint.

İçecekler.name: Iced Coffee
İçecekler.description: Chilled espresso with milk and a touch of caramel syrup.

İçecekler.name: Sparkling Water
İçecekler.description: Lightly carbonated mineral water served cold.
